title: [K-12] Multimedia-Based Language Learning Project Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and digital literacy
context.additional_context: Learners possess advanced expertise in language domains and are accustomed to project-based learning environments using digital devices. Their learning motivation primarily focuses on enhancing practical language skills.

learning_goals: Learners can independently produce language project outcomes using multimedia tools (interactive maps, videos, etc.)
Learners can analyze language structures and cultural contexts with over 80% accuracy through multimedia-based activities (quizzes, story creation, etc.)
Learners implement creative language expressions at least three times by combining peer feedback and multimedia resources during project execution
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
